results.title: Missing CSRF Token
results.description: Form at 'https://www.rexcybersolutions.com/' does not appear to have a CSRF token. This may make it vulnerable to Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) attacks.
results.short_description: Form at 'https://www.rexcybersolutions.com/' does not appear to have a CSRF token. This may make it vulnerable to Cross-Site Request Forgery

results.title: Exposed Path Found: /robots.txt
results.description: An accessible path was discovered at https://www.rexcybersolutions.com/robots.txt, which returned a status code of 200. This could expose sensitive files, directory listings, or functionality.
results.short_description: An accessible path was discovered at https://www.rexcybersolutions.com/robots.txt, which returned a status code of 200. This could expose se
results.remediation: Ensure that sensitive files and directories are not publicly accessible. Configure your web server to show a 404 Not Found error instead of a 403 Forbidden error for non-existent resources to avoid path enumeration. Restrict access to authorized users where necessary.
results.countermeasures: Ensure that sensitive files and directories are not publicly accessible. Configure your web server to show a 404 Not Found error instead of a 403 Forbidden error for non-existent resources to avoid path enumeration. Restrict access to authorized users where necessary.
results.impact: Information disclosure, potential for further attacks.

results.title: CORS check error
results.remediation: Ensure the target is reachable and supports HTTP(S).
results.countermeasures: Ensure the target is reachable and supports HTTP(S).

results.title: Missing Strict-Transport-Security Header

results.short_description: The Strict-Transport-Security header is missing. Enforces HTTPS connections

results.title: Missing X-Content-Type-Options Header
results.description: The X-Content-Type-Options header is missing. Prevents MIME type sniffing
